P.O.D. Account.definition: an account payable on request to an original party or upon the party's death to one or more designated beneficiaries NOTE
P.O.D. Account.origin: [ P ayable O n D eath]

1.1: an account payable on request to an original party or upon the party's death to one or more designated beneficiaries
1.note: A P.O.D. account is one of the few vehicles for the transfer of a decedent's property outside of probate.
